skills.name: Anti-Material Beam
skills.description: Rapid-fire weapon that deals continuous DMG to targets along a straight line of fire. Continuous firing will overheat the weapon. Closer enemies take more DMG (maxes at 10-meter range or less). Attacks against mob enemies gain 60% Total DMG Multiplier.

skills.name: Quantum Outbreak
skills.description: Killing an enemy has a 60% chance for the character to gain 75% Physical DMG for 3s.
